      • testHandleMessages

        public void testHandleMessages()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Test message dispatching to OFMessageListeners. Test ordering of listeners for different types (we do this implicitly by using STOP and CONTINUE and making sure the processing stops at the right place) Verify that a listener that throws an exception halts further execution, and verify that the Commands STOP and CONTINUE are honored.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
